description: Creates the specified connection alias for use with cross-Region redirection. For more information, see Cross-Region Redirection for Amazon WorkSpaces.

parameters.name: ConnectionString
parameters.description: A connection string in the form of a fully qualified domain name (FQDN), such as www.example.com.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to associate with the connection alias. (dict) --- Describes a tag. The key of the tag. Value (string) --- The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: AliasId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the connection alias.
